name: Apedoge
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Apedoge is a Play2Earn arcade game based on a dystopian story of war between two main virtual animal clans that were mixed one in another by generative collapse and virtual biocatastrofy. In this version all the events are taking place in the Web3 reality.

The player will have to separate one clan from another by burning coins of each clan in a right way and collect as many tokens as they can, tapping the carnival drum on the beat at almost madness speed
